magic_check: This function requires a NEW `magic_set` structure as its parameter which can not be shared with other functions. To use it, first create a SEPARATE magic_set by calling `struct magic_set *magic_open(int flags)`, and clean up afterward by calling `void magic_close(struct magic_set *)`.
magic_list: This function requires a NEW `magic_set` structure as its parameter which can not be shared with other functions. To use it, first create a SEPARATE magic_set by calling `struct magic_set *magic_open(int flags)`, and clean up afterward by calling `void magic_close(struct magic_set *)`.
